mapper.select:
select driver.* from ent_driver driver where driver.sys_status = 1
and concat(driver.driver_name,driver.delivery_line,driver.phone) like "%${keyword}%"
order by if(isnull(driver.modified_time),0,driver.modified_time) desc,driver.created_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into ent_driver ( id, driver_name, delivery_line, phone, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{driver_name}, #{delivery_line}, #{phone}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ent_driver set driver_name = #{driver_name}, delivery_line = #{delivery_line}, phone = #{phone}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ent_driver set sys_status = 0, modifier_id = #{modifier_id}, modified_time = now() where id=#{id}
